home.title: Time to Sleep - Bedtime Stories for Your Children

home.welcomeDescription: Discover magical bedtime stories with beautiful illustrations. Perfect for family reading and helping children fall asleep peacefully.

about.title: About Us - Time to Sleep
about.description: Learn more about Time to Sleep. Our mission is to create high-quality bedtime stories for children and families.
about.keywords: about us, mission, stories, children's stories, family reading, time to sleep
about.pageDescription: We create a world of magical bedtime stories that help children develop imagination, learn kindness, and fall asleep peacefully with a smile on their face.
about.missionDescription1: We believe that every bedtime story is not just a tale before sleep, but an opportunity for a child to explore the world, develop empathy, and creative thinking.
about.missionDescription2: Our goal is to create a safe, high-quality, and accessible space for family reading where every child will find a story they love on Time to Sleep.
about.storyDescription: The history of Time to Sleep began with a simple idea — to create a place where parents can find high-quality bedtime stories for their children.

idea.title: Idea
idea.description: Realization that high-quality children's bedtime stories should be available to every child

development.title: Development
development.description: Creating a platform with a convenient interface and high-quality content

growth.title: Growth
growth.description: Continuous expansion of the library and improvement of user experience

about.featuresDescription: Time to Sleep is created with the needs of modern families in mind

library.title: Rich Library
library.description: Hundreds of bedtime stories and tales for children of different ages, from classic to modern

search.title: Convenient Search
search.description: Easily find bedtime stories by topics, age, and your child's preferences

illustrations.title: Beautiful Illustrations
illustrations.description: Every story is accompanied by high-quality images that develop imagination

safety.title: Safety
safety.description: All content is carefully checked and suitable for children of all ages

love.title: Created with Love
love.description: Every story is selected and adapted with care for children and their development

speed.title: Fast Loading
speed.description: Optimized platform works fast on all devices

team.title: Our Team
team.description: We are a team of enthusiasts who believe in the power of good bedtime stories

anna.name: Anna
anna.description: Educator and mother of two children who knows how important quality bedtime reading is

michal.name: Michael
michal.description: Creates technologies that make bedtime reading convenient and enjoyable

elena.name: Elena
elena.description: Selects and adapts stories to make them interesting and useful for bedtime

cta.title: Join Our Community
cta.description: Read bedtime stories, share impressions and help us create better content for children

footer.title: Time to Sleep
footer.description: We create a world of magical bedtime stories for children and their parents. Every story is a journey into the world of imagination and kindness.

contact.title: Contact - Time to Sleep
contact.description: Contact Time to Sleep. We are here to help and answer all questions about our bedtime stories.
contact.keywords: contact, help, questions, stories, support, time to sleep
contact.pageDescription: Have questions or suggestions about Time to Sleep? We'd love to hear from you!

form.name: Name
form.subject: Subject
form.successMessage: Thank you! Your message has been sent. We will respond to you soon.
form.title: Send Message

addStory.question: How to add a new story?
addStory.answer: Send us an email with a description of the story and we will consider adding it to Time to Sleep.

useStories.question: Can I use your stories?
useStories.answer: All stories on Time to Sleep are available for personal use. For commercial use, please contact us.

terms.title: Terms of Use - Time to Sleep
terms.description: Read the terms of use for Time to Sleep, our children's bedtime stories platform.
terms.keywords: terms of use, rules, stories, guidelines, time to sleep

acceptance.title: Acceptance of Terms
acceptance.content: By using Time to Sleep, you accept these terms of use.

service.title: Service Description
service.content: Time to Sleep provides access to a collection of children's bedtime stories and tales, designed for reading to children before bedtime. Our service includes:
service.features: Library of bedtime stories and tales, Categorization by topics and age groups, Ability to search and filter content, Access to illustrations and images

usage.title: Usage Rights
usage.content: We grant you a limited, non-exclusive, non-transferable right to use Time to Sleep for personal, non-commercial purposes in compliance with these Terms.
usage.allowedItems: Reading bedtime stories to children, Using content for educational purposes, Sharing links to Time to Sleep, Printing stories for personal use
usage.prohibitedItems: Commercial use of content without permission, Copying and distributing content for commercial purposes, Modifying or creating derivative works, Using automated tools to collect content

stories.title: About Stories on Time to Sleep
stories.content: Stories on Time to Sleep are adaptations based on well-known stories that are in the public domain. The adaptation is made to maximally fit the designated age ranges, however parents should familiarize themselves with the text and independently decide whether it is suitable for their child before reading it or giving it to their child to read. The adaptation is made both with the help of software and with the help of human review.

intellectual.title: Intellectual Property
intellectual.content: All content on Time to Sleep, including but not limited to texts, images, illustrations, design, software and databases, is protected by intellectual property laws.
intellectual.copyright: Copyright to stories belongs to their authors or is in the public domain. We make every effort to respect copyright and ask to report any violations.

liability.title: Limitation of Liability
liability.content: Time to Sleep is provided "as is" without any warranties. We are not responsible for:
liability.items: Any errors or inaccuracies in content, Platform downtime, Data loss or technical failures, Actions of third parties, Any indirect or incidental damages

privacy.title: Privacy
privacy.content: Use of Time to Sleep is also governed by our Privacy Policy, which is an integral part of these Terms.

changes.title: Changes to Terms
changes.content: We reserve the right to change these Terms at any time. Changes take effect from the moment they are published on Time to Sleep. Continued use of the platform after changes are made means acceptance of new terms.

termination.title: Termination of Use
termination.content: We may suspend or terminate access to Time to Sleep at any time without prior notice in case of violation of these Terms or for other reasons.

law.title: Applicable Law
law.content: These Terms are governed by Polish law. Any disputes are resolved in accordance with applicable law.

contact.title: Contact Information
contact.content: If you have questions about these Terms, please contact us:

effective.content: These Terms of Use take effect from the moment they are published and remain in force until they are repealed or changed.

privacy.title: Privacy Policy - Time to Sleep
privacy.description: Learn how we protect your privacy on Time to Sleep, our bedtime stories platform.
privacy.keywords: privacy policy, data protection, privacy, stories, time to sleep

introduction.title: Introduction
introduction.content: Time to Sleep (hereinafter — "we", "our", "Platform") respects your privacy and is committed to protecting your personal information. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, store, and protect information about you.
introduction.agreement: By using Time to Sleep, you agree to the practices described in this Privacy Policy.

provided.title: Information You Provide to Us
provided.content: We may collect information that you voluntarily provide to us:
provided.items: Name and contact information (when sending messages through the contact form), Messages and feedback you send to us, Information you provide during registration (if such functionality is added)

automatic.title: Automatically Collected Information
automatic.content: When visiting Time to Sleep, we automatically collect certain information:
automatic.items: Server logs: IP address, browser type, operating system, access time, Cookies: small files that help improve Platform functionality, Analytics: information about how you use Time to Sleep, Device: information about your device and browser

usage.title: How We Use Your Information
usage.content: We use the collected information for the following purposes:
usage.items: Providing and improving our bedtime stories service, Responding to your questions and feedback, Analyzing Platform usage to improve user experience, Ensuring security and preventing fraud, Compliance with legal obligations, Sending important notifications about changes to our services

sharing.title: Sharing Information with Third Parties
sharing.content: We do not sell, rent, or transfer your personal information to third parties, except in the following cases:
sharing.items: With your consent: when you explicitly allow us to share information, Service providers: trusted partners who help us provide services, Legal requirements: when required by law or to protect our rights, Security: to prevent fraud or ensure security

cookies.title: Cookies and Tracking Technologies
cookies.content: We use cookies and similar technologies to:
cookies.items: Remember your preferences, Analyze Platform usage, Improve performance, Personalize content
cookies.management: You can manage cookie settings in your browser. Note that disabling cookies may affect Time to Sleep functionality.

security.title: Data Security
security.content: We take reasonable measures to protect your personal information:
security.items: Using encryption for data transmission, Regular security system updates, Limited access to personal information, Monitoring systems for suspicious activity
security.note: However, no method of transmission over the internet or electronic storage is 100% secure. We strive to use commercially acceptable means to protect your personal information.

storage.title: Data Storage
storage.content: We store your personal information only for the time necessary to achieve the purposes described in this Privacy Policy or in accordance with legal requirements.
storage.deletion: When we no longer need your personal information, we securely delete or anonymize it.

rights.title: Your Rights
rights.content: Depending on your location, you may have the following rights regarding your personal information:
rights.items: Right of access: receive a copy of your personal information, Right to rectification: correct inaccurate or incomplete information, Right to erasure: delete your personal information, Right to restriction: limit processing of your information, Right to portability: receive your information in a structured format, Right to object: object to processing of your information

children.title: Children and Privacy
children.content: Time to Sleep is intended for family use, but we do not knowingly collect personal information from children under 13 without parental or guardian consent.
children.removal: If we learn that we have collected personal information from a child under 13 without appropriate consent, we will immediately delete this information.

international.title: International Data Transfer
international.content: Your information may be transferred and processed in countries other than your country of residence. We take measures to ensure that such transfer complies with applicable data protection laws.

changes.title: Changes to Privacy Policy
changes.content: We may update this Privacy Policy from time to time. We will notify you of any material changes by posting a new version on Time to Sleep and updating the "Last updated" date.
changes.recommendation: We recommend regularly reviewing this Privacy Policy to stay informed about how we protect your information.

contact.title: Contact Information
contact.content: If you have questions or concerns about this Privacy Policy, please contact us:

effective.content: This Privacy Policy takes effect from the moment it is published and remains in force until it is repealed or changed.

upload.fileTooLarge: File size must be less than 5MB
upload.deleteConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete this image?
